mapper.sql: id, title, content, itemId, startTime, endTime, createUser, mobile, unitGroup, createdUserId, budget, orgId, auditStatus, auditReason, createdTime, updatedTime
mapper.select:
select id, title, content, itemId, startTime, endTime, createUser, mobile, unitGroup, createdUserId, budget, orgId, auditStatus, auditReason, createdTime, updatedTime from activity_report where 1=1
and orgId = #{orgId}
and unitGroup like concat('%',#{unitGroup},'%') escape '/'
and title like concat('%',#{title},'%') escape '/'
